findings.liver: homogenous attenuation throughout, no focal lesions.
findings.gallbladder: within normal limits, minimal pericholecystic fluid.
findings.pancreas: normal attenuation throughout, no focal lesions or pancreatic ductal dilatation.
findings.spleen: normal size and attenuation throughout, no focal lesions.

kidneys.description: normal and symmetric size with normal nephrogram.
findings: 3 mm non-obstructing stone in the interpolar region of the right kidney.
7 mm non-obstructing stone in the lower pole of the left kidney.
Multiple hypodense lesions throughout the left kidney, largest being a simple cyst measuring 2.5 x 3.3 cm.

findings.colon: extensive diverticulosis with stranding and bowel wall thickening involving the sigmoid colon surrounding an inflamed diverticulum.
findings.bladder: unremarkable, no free fluid in the pelvis.
